titleStmt.title: The History of self-defence, in requital to the history of passive obedience
titleStmt.author: Seller, Abednego, 1646?-1705.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Abednego Seller. Cf. Wing, NUC pre-1956.
"The history of passive obedience since the reformation" was written by Abednego Seller.
This work appears at reel 778:37 as Wing S2456 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.) and at reel 1702:14 as Wing H2138B.
Reproduction of originals in Harvard University Library and Huntington Library.
